about_the_game:
In a world where fantasy and reality blur, "Lady's Escape" invites you into the life of a young noblewoman. Bound by tradition but yearning for freedom, she finds herself confined to a remote villa as punishment.


A thirst for life's pleasures deemed too scandalous. Yet, hope sparks when an invitation arrives from her best friend. A plan forms: escape the villa and reclaim her freedom.
But beware, the butler's eyes are ever-watchful. Will she dance under the stars once more or remain caged in silk and stone?


  • Dive into an engaging story of rebellion and desire with 6K+ words.
  • Experience multiple animated NSFW scenes that reward your journey.
  • Enjoy an elaborated plot where your choices decide your fate in the story.
  • Multiple Characters.


  • Unique Setting: A fantasy old-like world where every choice leads to unexpected paths.
  • Engaging Plot: A tale of defiance and the quest for freedom.
  • Interactive Gameplay: Your decisions shape the story. Choose wisely.


"Lady's Escape" is not just a game; it's a journey into a world where courage faces convention. Can you outwit the watchful eyes and guide our heroine to the party of a lifetime? The path is fraught with challenge and temptation. Are you ready to take the first step?

Dive into "Lady's Escape" now and unleash the story that awaits. Your adventure begins here.
detailed_description:
In a world where fantasy and reality blur, "Lady's Escape" invites you into the life of a young noblewoman. Bound by tradition but yearning for freedom, she finds herself confined to a remote villa as punishment.


A thirst for life's pleasures deemed too scandalous. Yet, hope sparks when an invitation arrives from her best friend. A plan forms: escape the villa and reclaim her freedom.
But beware, the butler's eyes are ever-watchful. Will she dance under the stars once more or remain caged in silk and stone?


  • Dive into an engaging story of rebellion and desire with 6K+ words.
  • Experience multiple animated NSFW scenes that reward your journey.
  • Enjoy an elaborated plot where your choices decide your fate in the story.
  • Multiple Characters.


  • Unique Setting: A fantasy old-like world where every choice leads to unexpected paths.
  • Engaging Plot: A tale of defiance and the quest for freedom.
  • Interactive Gameplay: Your decisions shape the story. Choose wisely.


"Lady's Escape" is not just a game; it's a journey into a world where courage faces convention. Can you outwit the watchful eyes and guide our heroine to the party of a lifetime? The path is fraught with challenge and temptation. Are you ready to take the first step?

Dive into "Lady's Escape" now and unleash the story that awaits. Your adventure begins here.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Lady's Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Join a young lady in 'Lady's Escape,' an NSFW visual novel. Help a young noblewoman flee her confines and pursue freedom. Make choices, avoid the butler's watch, and seduce your way out of the mansion. Can you help her succeed?
